atom:category.label: Services of ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP).\

atom:entry.atom:summary:
An OData UI service makes it possible to consume a RAP service with a Fiori Elements UI or other UI clients. It creates all UI-specific information that is annotated in the RAP artifacts in the OData service metadata. A UI service can be previewed with the Fiori Elements App Preview in the service binding artifact.

This generator creates all the development objects that are relevant for a business object and for a RAP service on the basis of one database table. The end result is a full-blown RAP UI service.

Specifically, the following objects are created:

  • CDS view entity
  • CDS behavior definition
  • ABAP implementation class
  • CDS projection view entity
  • CDS projection behavior definition
  • Draft database table
  • Metadata extension
  • CDS service definition
  • Service binding
atom:entry.atom:title: OData UI Service
